duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate and resolve supervisory complaint inquiries escalated from various Corporate Institutional Services Teams.
Submit customer complaints in a timely manner and proactively resolve client issues.
Liaise with the Legal and Compliance Division regarding customer complaints and litigation.
Work closely with the Recovery team to resolve client issues with professionalism and care.
Ensure appropriate supervisory coverage is maintained within the team.
Implement procedures to ensure that approvals are handled appropriately and timely.
Provide coaching and guidance on policies and procedures to promote risk awareness in a compliant environment.
Support the risk team in the preparation for and response to audits as needed.
Keep current on SEC/FINRA, Compliance, and Firm guidelines and apply them to ensure risk mitigation.
Recognize and mitigate risks effectively by understanding and adhering to all policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience.
